alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Bremerton and Vicinity; Everett and Vicinity; Hood Canal Area; San Juan County; Seattle and Vicinity; Tacoma Area; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 24 at 2:45AM PST until December 24 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Tacoma Area, San Juan County, Western Whatcom County, Hood Canal Area, Everett and Vicinity, Western Skagit County, Seattle and Vicinity, Bremerton and Vicinity and Admiralty Inlet Area. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST today. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. High tide later this morning will be up to 1.5 ft above the tide table prediction. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide at Seattle will be around 9 AM. The tide table prediction is 12.2 feet but with low pressure over the region the actual high tide should be around 13.7 ft.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
